## .rladies[.weight[.fontone[Importando de un solo golpe!]]]

## con la familia apply
tbl <- sapply(files, read_excel, simplify=TRUE) %>% 
bind_rows(.id = "id")

##NAMES
names(tbl)<-gsub("Valor en ","AÃ‘O",names(tbl))
names(tbl)<-gsub("-",".",names(tbl))
